channel.title: Need help with getvar()

item.title: Need help with getvar()
item.dc:creator: lIMonkieIl
item.description:
getvar = gets a user variable (user needs to be logged in)
setvar = sets a user variable (user needs to be logged in)
var = gets global variable (you can pick if needs to be authed or not)

its “var” you need to use i believe.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with getvar()
item.dc:creator: Facepunch
item.description:
Hey Everyone !
So i wanted to make an auto update system and for that i want to use some variables
So i created one and i tryed to print it out but if i run the application it breaks !
and a window with “example.exe doesnt work anymore” appears

std::cout << KeyAuthApp.getvar("fileid") << std::endl;

thats my code …
